div.a: White Nationalists Are Thrilled With Obama's Victory

div.div: White nationalist leaders will see this election as a chance -- possibly their last -- to make a case to mainstream Americans and convert pedestrian, non-obsessed racists into ideological, single-issue racists.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VYXs4Y&via=Digg&text=White Nationalists Are Thrilled With Obama's Victory

div.div: 'THEY'VE BEEN TRYING TO GET ME FOR MONTHS'
Convinced that he’ll be killed if he’s taken into custody for questioning, the antivirus pioneer has gone into hiding somewhere in Belize. That hasn't stopped him from telling his side of the story.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VYOh4K&via=Digg&text=Murder Suspect John McAfee: 'I'm Innocent'

div.a: Shirtless Photos Place FBI Agent In Petraeus Case Under Scrutiny

div.div: Even as the FBI delved into Petraeus's personal life, the agency had to address questionable conduct by one of its own—including allegedly sending shirtless photos of himself to a woman involved in the case.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W4egD1&via=Digg&text=Shirtless Photos Place FBI Agent In Petraeus Case Under Scrutiny

div.a: Windows Head Steven Sinofsky To Leave Microsoft

div.div: The move comes less than a month after he the launch of Windows 8 and Microsoft’s Surface tablet–products seen as key to the future if the PC software pioneer is to retain its position in the market.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TWJSNo&via=Digg&text=Windows Head Steven Sinofsky To Leave Microsoft

div.a: Did An Anonymous Wikipedia Editor Try To Out The Petraeus Affair Back In January?

div.div: There's not much on Paula Broadwell's Wikipedia page before last Friday. In late January, however, there was something that turned up on her then brand-new entry that is, in retrospect, very notable.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TBYr4c&via=Digg&text=Did An Anonymous Wikipedia Editor Try To Out The Petraeus Affair Back In January?

div.div: TEACH ME HOW TO GANGNAM STYLE

div.a: Psy Reveals The Secret Of His Success To Oxford Students

div.div: “I stayed up for 30 nights to find that horse riding dance,” expounded the now truly global Korean rapper, Psy, to a packed hall of enraptured undergrads.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T3Y5Wk&via=Digg&text=Psy Reveals The Secret Of His Success To Oxford Students

div.a: GIF Beats Out YOLO To Become The Oxford American Dictionaries’ 2012 Word Of The Year

div.div: The competition for 2012′s word of the year was understandably fierce. GIF beat out some worthy contenders in order to win the title.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RPALNP&via=Digg&text=GIF Beats Out YOLO To Become The Oxford American Dictionaries’ 2012 Word Of The Year

div.a: How To Get Away With An Affair In 2012

div.div: We know that one of the most powerful men in the world, tasked with keeping the greatest secrets, wasn't able to hide his covert action over Gmail. That's really bad. The good news is, you can do better.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UDq9Pg&via=Digg&text=How To Get Away With An Affair In 2012

div.a: When Did People Start Calling Each Other 'Poopy Head'?

div.div: In an interview Monday morning, anti-tax lobbyist Grover Norquist said that President Obama won the election by portraying Romney as a “poopy head.” When did people start calling each other “poopy head”?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TwpMY5&via=Digg&text=When Did People Start Calling Each Other 'Poopy Head'?

div.div: "When people find out I was raised in Scientology they are almost uniformly intrigued; over the years I’ve developed a simple spiel to explain what it is that Scientologists actually believe."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Sgl7HS&via=Digg&text=What Scientologists Actually Believe

div.a: New e-Skin Is Sensitive To Touch And Self-Healing

div.div: Chemists and engineers at Stanford say their synthetic material could help produce smarter prosthetics and resilient personal electronics that self-repair.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PPX3zd&via=Digg&text=New e-Skin Is Sensitive To Touch And Self-Healing

div.a: Get A Hollywood Studio To Green Light Your Picture In 29 Easy Steps

div.div: 1. Hire unpaid intern to read huge pile of scripts and books. Miraculously intern finds brilliant story everyone else has overlooked.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VXyIdi&via=Digg&text=Get A Hollywood Studio To Green Light Your Picture In 29 Easy Steps

div.a: Make A Social Website In 60 Seconds From Your iPhone

div.div: Zapd lets you create websites from the comfort of your own iPhone. They promise 60 seconds, but we bet you can do it in 59.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/gHxR54&via=Digg&text=Make A Social Website In 60 Seconds From Your iPhone

div.div: A REAL REASON TO MOVE TO CANADA

In rich, debt-laden economies the policymaking horizon is short-term: a recovery is the priority. Very long-range forecasts from the OECD, a think-tank, may seem an exercise in irrelevance. But they are a useful reminder of the economic and demographic factors that keep grinding away in the background.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QtMcw0&via=Digg&text=The World In 2060

div.div: If 24-year-old University of Texas law student and part-time revolutionary Cody Wilson has his way, every human being in the United States, whether old or young, licensed or unlicensed, will soon be able to make a fully functioning, perfectly lethal gun in the comfort of their very own living rooms, for less than the cost of a few drinks.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QBBgfO&via=Digg&text=Shots Heard 'Round The World

div.div: WHICH IS MORE DANGEROUS, BIKES OR ZIPPERS?

div.a: The Top Ways We Injure Our Genitals

div.div: Some things to look out for are falling toilet seats, irritative soaps, or the variety of things that can go wrong "when trying to jump or step over a chair."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RTn7HL&via=Digg&text=The Top Ways We Injure Our Genitals

div.a: Petraeus Affair Offers Unintentional Lesson On Password Reuse

div.div: The whole episode is a textbook illustration of how hashed password leaks occur, how easily the hashes are broken, and how important it is not to reuse passwords across accounts.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Q8Q0mH&via=Digg&text=Petraeus Affair Offers Unintentional Lesson On Password Reuse

div.a: How YouTube Processes 72 Hours of Video In 1 Minute

div.div: Every minute of the day, users upload an average of 72 hours of footage to the site. YouTube engineers tell us how they deal with so much data without getting bogged down—or creating an unwieldy, unsearchable site.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XyUvIW&via=Digg&text=How YouTube Processes 72 Hours of Video In 1 Minute

div.a: How Often Do People Have Sex At The Office?

div.div: Offices are no longer the great bastions of sex that they were in the "Mad Men" era, when doors were thick and carpeting thicker.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SgyBU9&via=Digg&text=How Often Do People Have Sex At The Office?

div.div: POE WAS 'JOHN MCCAIN OF HIS TIME'

div.a: Edgar Allan Poe, Bea Arthur, Jimi Hendrix And Other Weird Military Veterans

div.div: It's Veterans Day, America's most ambiguously celebrated federal holiday. Let's celebrate by enjoying this video jukebox of surprising famous/infamous military veterans.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SgCgkU&via=Digg&text=Edgar Allan Poe, Bea Arthur, Jimi Hendrix And Other Weird Military Veterans

div.a: Anti-Virus Founder John McAfee Wanted For Murder

div.div: Antivirus pioneer John McAfee is on the run from murder charges.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TBoOHu&via=Digg&text=Anti-Virus Founder John McAfee Wanted For Murder

div.div: COULD ALSO BE A SIDEWAYS MUSTACHE

div.a: Maybe That Romney Face Tattoo Wasn't Such A Good Idea

div.div: With the election over, supporters of Mitt Romney have to pack up their campaign signs and paraphernalia and get on with their lives. But what if you can’t get rid of that stuff? Literally.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZfsPId&via=Digg&text=Maybe That Romney Face Tattoo Wasn't Such A Good Idea

div.a: This Is What A $9,000 Cocktail Looks Like

div.div: The eponymous Salvatore’s Legacy does not come with your own private jet. Mixologist Salvatore Calabrese kinda dropped the ball on that one. But this $8850 product does have just about everything else.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XyKeMP&via=Digg&text=This Is What A $9,000 Cocktail Looks Like

div.a: U.S. To Overtake Saudi Arabia As World's Top Oil Producer

div.div: The United States will overtake Saudi Arabia and Russia as the world's top oil producer by 2017, the West's energy agency said on Monday, predicting Washington will come very close to achieving a previously unthinkable energy self-sufficiency.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W35yFc&via=Digg&text=U.S. To Overtake Saudi Arabia As World's Top Oil Producer

div.a: How To Break Out Of Ziptie Handcuffs

div.div: A young woman demonstrates that, in case you get into the situation of being handcuffed with a ziptie, breaking out of them is a lot easier than you thought.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SZFhtP&via=Digg&text=How To Break Out Of Ziptie Handcuffs

div.div: Dear Mr. President: A Hunger Games-style event would be your legacy. America needs this -- and so do you.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SgwGyP&via=Digg&text=Time To Commence 'The Obama Games!'

div.div: ALL THAT GLITTERS DOES NOT BRING YOU GOLD

div.a: In Praise Of The Extremely Ugly And Highly Functional Corporate Website

div.div: It's hard to imagine that these boring sites aren’t deliberate. The implicit message is: We are too busy managing your money to bother with what amount to fancy brochures.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WZEzjZ&via=Digg&text=In Praise Of The Extremely Ugly And Highly Functional Corporate Website

div.a: A Space Rocket Explained Using Only The 1000 Most Commonly Used Words

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TsC2Ji&via=Digg&text=A Space Rocket Explained Using Only The 1000 Most Commonly Used Words
